languages.text: "Я скажу! Я скажу!" {n}Лексмеханик поспешно роется в своих лохмотьях, пока не находит обрывок пергамента.{/n} "За мышечную память у меня отвечает иная аугментика с накопителем данных — я помню, куда ходил и как нажимал пальцами... вот, вот координаты... и код. Наверное, код от отсека". {n}Он отчаянно выскребает ногтем цифры и передает обрывок дознавателю.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Я скажу! Я скажу! Я помню..." {n}Лексмеханик поспешно роется в своих лохмотьях, пока не находит обрывок пергамента.{/n} "За мышечную память у меня отвечает иная аугментика с накопителем данных — я помню, куда ходил и как нажимал пальцами... вот, вот координаты... и код. Наверное, код от отсека". {n}Он отчаянно выскребает ногтем цифры и передает обрывок дознавателю, который внимательно изучает его и кивает.{/n}
traits.speaker: ScrappedTechpriest

languages.text: "I'll tell you! I'll tell you!" {n}The Lexmechanic rummages in his ragged clothes until he produces a scrap of parchment.{/n} "A different augmetic is responsible for my muscle memory. It has a data storage too. I remember where I walked and what I pressed with my fingers... here, here are the coordinates... and the code. It's probably the code to the bay." {n}He scratches out the numbers with his fingernail and passes the parchment to Heinrix.{/n}

languages.text: “我告诉我！我会告诉你的！”{n}思律机僧在他褴褛的衣衫中翻找着，最终找出了一张羊皮纸。{/n}“我还有另一个植入物，负责记录我的肌肉记忆，它也有个数据存储装置。我还记得我走过的地方和手指按过的东西……来，这里是机器的坐标……还有密码。估计这个就是通往机器区域的密码。”{n}他用指甲划下了几个数字，把羊皮纸递给了海因里希。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I'll tell you! I'll tell you!" {n}The Lexmechanic rummages in his ragged clothes until he produces a scrap of parchment.{/n} "A different augmetic is responsible for my muscle memory. It has a data storage too. I remember where I walked and what I pressed with my fingers... here, here are the coordinates... and the code. It's probably the code to the bay." {n}He scratches out the numbers with his fingernail and passes the parchment to Heinrix.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “我告诉我！我会告诉你的！”{n}法律技工在他褴褛的衣衫中翻找着，最终找出了一张羊皮纸。{/n}“我还有另一个植入物，负责记录我的肌肉记忆，它也有个数据存储装置。我还记得我走过的地方和手指按过的东西……来，这里是机器的坐标……还有密码。估计这个就是通往机器区域的密码。”{n}他用指甲划下了几个数字，把羊皮纸递给了海因里希。{/n}
traits.speaker: ScrappedTechpriest

languages.text: «¡Les ayudaré! ¡Se lo diré!». {n}El lexmecánico rebusca en sus ropas harapientas hasta dar con un trozo de pergamino.{/n} «El responsable de mi memoria muscular es otro aumético. También tiene un almacén de datos, por lo que recuerdo por dónde he caminado y qué han pulsado mis dedos... tomen, estas son las coordenadas... y el código. Probablemente sea el código del hangar». {n}Inscribe los últimos números con la uña y le entrega el pergamino a Heinrix.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I'll tell you! I'll tell you!" {n}The Lexmechanic rummages in his ragged clothes until he produces a scrap of parchment.{/n} "A different augmetic is responsible for my muscle memory. It has a data storage too. I remember where I walked and what I pressed with my fingers... here, here are the coordinates... and the code. It's probably the code to the bay." {n}He scratches out the numbers with his fingernail and passes the parchment to Heinrix.{/n}

También tiene un almacén de datos, por lo que recuerdo por dónde he caminado y qué han pulsado mis dedos... tomen, estas son las coordenadas... y el código. Probablemente sea el código del hangar». {n}Inscribe los últimos números con la uña y le entrega el pergamino a Heinrix.{/n}
traits.speaker: ScrappedTechpriest

languages.text: 「教えます！教えますとも！」{n}法技術者はぼろぼろの服をあさり、羊皮紙の切れ端を取り出す。{/n}「別のオーグメティックが私の筋肉の記憶を担当しています。これはデータストレージでもあるのです。どこを歩き、何を指で押したかを記録していて…これが座標…そしてコードです。おそらくは、ベイへのコードでしょう」{n}彼は爪で数字を掻き出し、羊皮紙をハインリックスへと渡す。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I'll tell you! I'll tell you!" {n}The Lexmechanic rummages in his ragged clothes until he produces a scrap of parchment.{/n} "A different augmetic is responsible for my muscle memory. It has a data storage too. I remember where I walked and what I pressed with my fingers... here, here are the coordinates... and the code. It's probably the code to the bay." {n}He scratches out the numbers with his fingernail and passes the parchment to Heinrix.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「教えます！教えますとも！」{n}法技術者はぼろぼろの服をあさり、羊皮紙の切れ端を取り出す。{/n}「別のオーグメティックが私の筋肉の記憶を担当しています。これはデータストレージでもあるのです。どこを歩き、何を指で押したかを記録していて…これが座標…そしてコードです。おそらくは、ベイへのコードでしょう」{n}彼は爪で数字を掻き出し、羊皮紙をハインリックスへと渡す。{/n}
traits.speaker: ScrappedTechpriest

languages.text: "Ich sage es Euch! Ich sage es Euch!" {n}Der Lexmechanicus kramt aus seiner zerschlissenen Kleidung ein Blatt Pergament hervor.{/n} "Für mein Muskelgedächtnis ist eine andere Augmentation zuständig. Sie hat ebenfalls einen Datenspeicher. Ich erinnere mich daran, wo ich gegangen bin und was ich mit meinen Fingern gedrückt habe ... hier sind die Koordinaten ... und der Code. Wahrscheinlich ist es der Code für die Bucht." {n}Er streicht die Zahlen mit dem Fingernagel durch und übergibt Heinrix das Pergament.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I'll tell you! I'll tell you!" {n}The Lexmechanic rummages in his ragged clothes until he produces a scrap of parchment.{/n} "A different augmetic is responsible for my muscle memory. It has a data storage too. I remember where I walked and what I pressed with my fingers... here, here are the coordinates... and the code. It's probably the code to the bay." {n}He scratches out the numbers with his fingernail and passes the parchment to Heinrix.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ich sage es Euch! Ich sage es Euch!" {n}Der Lexmechanicus kramt aus seiner zerschlissenen Kleidung ein Blatt Pergament hervor.{/n} "Für mein Muskelgedächtnis ist eine andere Augmentation zuständig. Sie hat ebenfalls einen Datenspeicher. Ich erinnere mich daran, wo ich gegangen bin und was ich mit meinen Fingern gedrückt habe ... hier sind die Koordinaten ... und der Code. Wahrscheinlich ist es der Code für die Bucht." {n}Er streicht die Zahlen mit dem Fingernagel durch und übergibt Heinrix das Pergament.{/n}
traits.speaker: ScrappedTechpriest

languages.text: « Je vais vous dire où le trouver ! » {n}Le lexmécanicien se met à fouiller dans ses haillons et finit par en sortir un morceau de parchemin.{/n} « Ma mémoire musculaire est gérée par un augmétique différent qui permet également le stockage de données. Je me rappelle où je suis passé et ce que j'ai touché... Tenez, voici les coordonnées... et un code. C'est certainement celui de la baie. » {n}Il écrit les chiffres avec son ongle et donne le parchemin à Heinrix.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I'll tell you! I'll tell you!" {n}The Lexmechanic rummages in his ragged clothes until he produces a scrap of parchment.{/n} "A different augmetic is responsible for my muscle memory. It has a data storage too. I remember where I walked and what I pressed with my fingers... here, here are the coordinates... and the code. It's probably the code to the bay." {n}He scratches out the numbers with his fingernail and passes the parchment to Heinrix.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Je vais vous dire où le trouver ! » {n}Le lexmécanicien se met à fouiller dans ses haillons et finit par en sortir un morceau de parchemin.{/n} « Ma mémoire musculaire est gérée par un augmétique différent qui permet également le stockage de données. Je me rappelle où je suis passé et ce que j'ai touché... Tenez, voici les coordonnées... et un code. C'est certainement celui de la baie. » {n}Il écrit les chiffres avec son ongle et donne le parchemin à Heinrix.{/n}
traits.speaker: ScrappedTechpriest

languages.text: "Söyleyeyim! Söyleyeyim!" {n}Lexmekanik, parça pinçik kıyafetlerini arayıp bir parşömen parçası çıkarıyor.{/n} "Kas hafızam farklı bir ogmetikle çalışıyor. Onun da kendi veri depolama birimi var. Nereye yürüdüğümü, parmaklarımın nelere dokunduğunu hatırlıyorum... İşte, koordinatlar... Bu da parola. Muhtemelen bölmenin parolası." {n}Tırnağıyla sayıları kazıdığı parşömeni Heinrix'e teslim ediyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I'll tell you! I'll tell you!" {n}The Lexmechanic rummages in his ragged clothes until he produces a scrap of parchment.{/n} "A different augmetic is responsible for my muscle memory. It has a data storage too. I remember where I walked and what I pressed with my fingers... here, here are the coordinates... and the code. It's probably the code to the bay." {n}He scratches out the numbers with his fingernail and passes the parchment to Heinrix.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Söyleyeyim! Söyleyeyim!" {n}Lexmekanik, parça pinçik kıyafetlerini arayıp bir parşömen parçası çıkarıyor.{/n} "Kas hafızam farklı bir ogmetikle çalışıyor. Onun da kendi veri depolama birimi var. Nereye yürüdüğümü, parmaklarımın nelere dokunduğunu hatırlıyorum... İşte, koordinatlar... Bu da parola. Muhtemelen bölmenin parolası." {n}Tırnağıyla sayıları kazıdığı parşömeni Heinrix'e teslim ediyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: ScrappedTechpriest
